attributes.action: Make the holocaust compulsory learning in secondary schools.
attributes.background: Introduce the history and background of the persecution and systematic slaughter of Jewish and non Jewish victims in nazi concentration camps. We need to remember, especially younger generations.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

Schools are already required to teach the Holocaust as part of the Key Stage 3 history curriculum. We are therefore unsure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
